title: 112_hr2553
content: The "Airport and Airway Extension Act of 2011, Part IV" extends fuel and ticket taxes funding the Airport and Airway Trust Fund until September 16, 2011. Additionally, the Act extends the expenditure authority of the Airport and Airway Trust Fund until September 17, 2011. SEC. 4. Extension of Airport Improvement Program authorizes $3,380,178,082 until September 16, 2011, with funds available until expended. Project grant authority extended until September 16, 2011. Section 40117(l)(7) of title 49, United States Code, is amended to change the date from July 23, 2011, to September 17, 2011. Various other sections in the same title are also amended to update dates from July to September and extend project grant authority until December 31, 2011. Section 186(d) of the Act is amended to change the date from July 23, 2011, to September 17, 2011. The amendments made by this section will take effect on July 23, 2011. Additionally, Section 41731(a)(1) of title 49, United States Code, is amended to reform the Essential Air Service, including criteria for airports to qualify for subsidies. The Secretary may waive the subsidy requirement for locations with geographic difficulties in accessing airports, and exceptions apply to locations in Alaska.
